name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-data-access-options
title: SharePoint - Use different options to access SharePoint data
shortDescription: This sample SPFx web part demonstrates multiple ways to read data from a SharePoint list/library. It includes side‑by‑side implementations using the native Fetch API, SPHttpClient, Microsoft Graph, and PnPjs.
longDescription: This sample SPFx web part demonstrates multiple ways to read data from a SharePoint list/library. It includes side‑by‑side implementations using the native Fetch API, SPHttpClient, Microsoft Graph, and PnPjs.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
